name: BUSPIRONE HYDROCHLORIDE
cautions:
Cautions does not alleviate benzodiazepine withdrawal (
(From Buspirone: British National Formulary)
Buspirone); interactions: Appendix 1 (anxiolytics and hypnotics)Driving May affect performance of
skilled tasks (e.g. driving); effects of alcohol may be enhanced
side-effects:
Side-effects nausea; dizziness, headache, nervousness, excitement; rarely dry mouth, tachycardia, palpitation, chest pain,
drowsiness, confusion, seizures, fatigue, and sweating
doses:
adult over 18 years, 5 mg
2–3 times daily, increased as necessary every 2–3 days; usual range
15–30 mg daily in divided doses; max. 45 mg daily
